text: Iovino is a surname. Notable people with this surname include: * Alessandro "Sandro" Iovino (born 1939), Italian actor and voice actor * Pamela Iovino, American politician from the state of Pennsylvania * Salvatore Iovino (born 1983), American professional stock car racing driver * Serenella Iovino, Italian philosopher, and cultural and literary theorist Category:Italian- language surnames
title: Iovino
